title: Ola Electric's dominance fades as Indian e-scooter battle intensifies
description: Ola Electric, India's leading electric scooter maker, recorded its lowest monthly sales in September. The company sold 23,965 vehicles, leading to a decline in market share to 27% from over 50% in April. Rivals TVS Motor and Bajaj Auto gained market share, benefiting from newer models and expanded service networks.
